body:
Dear Radiance users,


We inform you that starting from today is active our web site:


http://www.2016radiancews.org. 


Here you can find the workshop registration section, accommodation
information and much more.






For more information please contact us at: 2016RadianceWS at manens-tifs.it






Regards 


Giorgio Butturini, Roberto Zecchin
